title: Remarried to Mr. Billionaire - Novel Updates
tags: Affair   Divorce   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Lawyers   Marriage
author: 宝货
description: I always believe that I am the luckiest girl in the world. I find my soulmate and get married with my first love after graduation. What I don't expect is that he cheats on me and has affairs with his colleague, a girl younger than me after one year. I have no choice but get divorce. Luckily, God favors me another time. I meet him. He is a divorce lawyer who helps me deal with all those problems with my ex husband and get out of the painful memories. He even promises me a new life. Should I believe him?>
